oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.hierarchy

Class HierarchyDataIndexWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.hierarchy.HierarchyDataIndexWriter

  • public class HierarchyDataIndexWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to create and write an index for hierarchy data. A hierarchy data index is a map where the keys are parent id's which point to its children. Top level entries (hierarchy 1) or entries without parent are always associated to the key HierarchyInfo.UNDEFINED_PARENT_ID
    Author:
    hsaucedo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HierarchyDataIndexWriter(HierarchyInfo hierInfo, Path indexPath, JobConf conf)
      Creates a new instance and sets the HierarchyInfo which contains the hierarchy to be indexed and the path where the generated indices will be stored.

      Generates and writes an index for the specified hierarchy level.
      Path[] writeIndices(JobConf conf)

    • Constructor Detail

      • HierarchyDataIndexWriter

        public HierarchyDataIndexWriter(HierarchyInfo hierInfo,
                                Path indexPath,
                                JobConf conf)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new instance and sets the HierarchyInfo which contains the hierarchy to be indexed and the path where the generated indices will be stored.
        Parameters:
        hierInfo - an instance of HierarchyInfo. It is expected that the instance is already initialized and loaded with data.
        indexPath - the base path where all the hierarchy indices will be stored. It must be a directory.
        conf - the job configuration
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • writeIndex

        public Path writeIndex(int level,
                       JobConf conf)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Generates and writes an index for the specified hierarchy level.
        Parameters:
        level - the hierarchy level for which the index will be generated
        conf - the job configuration
        Returns:
        the path of the generated index
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeIndices

        public Path[] writeIndices(JobConf conf)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Creates and writes an index for each level of the current hierarchy defined by the HierarchyInfo object set at creation time
        Parameters:
        conf - the job configuration
        Returns:
        an array containing the paths of each index created. Paths are sorted by hierarchy level in ascending order.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
